name: Arcanum
description: This installer downloads and installs the Unofficial Arcanum Patch 2.0.0
notes:
The patch consists of several modules:

    UAP Base
    All the bug fixes plus Extra Animations, Extended Ambient Tracks, HQ Townmaps and HQ Music.
    High Resolution Patch
    Allows the game to be played at any resolution. Defaults to 720p. Improves Windows 10 compatibility.
    Official DLC
    Adds 7 additional mini-campaigns. You can choose them in Options -> Game -> Module.
    Race Mod
    Makes Orcs, Ogres and Dark Elves playable with their own portraits, backgrounds and unique NPC interactions
    Beta Content
    Various things restored from pre-release versions of Arcanum.
    Misc Mods
    Various miscellaneous mods and additions.
content:
files:
- patch: https://www.moddb.com/downloads/mirror/181909/125/c658ef08295488c4f0f3dbaf08341c05/?referer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.moddb.com%2Fgames%2Farcanum%2Fdownloads
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- move:
    description: Moving the Patch
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/UAP2.0.0.exe
    src: patch
- task:
    description: Running the Patch
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/UAP2.0.0.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: arcanum
